name: Re-ember (with Controller Support)
description:
A platformer with urgency.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!IMPORTANT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED

We added controller support last minute but forgot to update the title screen.

You will need to use the keyboard to get past the the title screen (Enter) and to restart (Esc)

Sorry for the confusion
